headline: LCI FUJI PAUDAL MARUMERIZER SPHERONIZER .5MM to 10MM SPHERES
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Fuji Paudal
Model QJ-230T
Description Spheronizer Marumerizer -- Lab Scale
Other Information Features
• Benchtop device ideal for a laboratory environment
• Easy disassembly of process parts
• 230 mm diameter friction plate
• Capable of producing 0.5 mm to 10.0 mm spheres
• Friction plates available with groove spaces of 2-8 mm
• Friction plates available in various grid patterns
• Variable plate speeds between 600- 1800 rpm
• GMP design with 316SS product contact parts
• 304SS jacketed bowl for heating/ cooling
• 1.0 hp 230 VAC/3/60 motor to drive friction plate
• Separate stainless steel control panel with motor starter and inverter
Extended Description Details at LCI Fuji Paudal QJ-230T Marumerizer-Spheronizer.pdf
Power Requirements 230 V 10.0 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Year of Manufacture 2011
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.843 in (50.4 cm)
Depth 15.748 in (40.0 cm)
Height 20.197 in (51.3 cm)
Weight 112 lb (51 kg)
